attributes.action: UK Government: Please match Stephen Sutton's fundraising total on his 'Just Giving page' for the Teenage Cancer Trust
attributes.additional_details: This petition has one simple request: for the UK Government to match the final total that is raised by Stephen Sutton's Teenage Cancer Trust 'Just Giving' Page, in recognition of his achievements and for all that he has done for the TCT. If you have been touched or affected by Stephen Sutton as I have been, please sign this petition.  In no way should this petition take away from what Stephen achieved.  It is down now to us all to fight for charities now that he has passed.  RIP Stephen.
